body_html: I have a similar problem... I created two Google cloud instances, one with a GPU attached, and the tensorflow-gpu conda package installed and the other with only vCPUs, and the tensorflow conda package. When running the same CNN on the same data, the CPU version gave better accuracy and loss than the GPU version.
